features: Search results can now be filtered to display artists, albums and or songs
Duplicates are detected when adding songs to playlist
improvements: Added more menu items for playlist list & detail screens (add to queue, rename, clear, delete)
Artist & album name are now displayed on separate lines on the Now Playing screen
Added 'play' option to artist detail screen context menu
The Media Store playlist importer is now more lenient when matching S2 tracks with Media Store tracks
Added an option to preferences to view open source licenses
notes: S2 has a very active community on Discord. If you haven't already, please come and join the conversation: https://discord.gg/YkhSuHJ

fixes: Fixed an issue preventing the file manager from being launched on Android R
improvements: Equalizer now supports 24-bit audio
Optimised queue restoration (queue loads faster when launching app)
Minor change to Chromecast HTTP server.. Now starts & stops in sync with 'CastSession'

fixes: Possible fix for mostly-vertical swipes causing horizontal paging
Fixed a performance issue causing excessive garbage collection and resulting in ANRs
improvements: Improved changelog
Updated compile sdk to Android 30

fixes: Fixed Chromecast issue for remote media providers (untested, please let me know if this works!)
Fixed an issue preventing certain images from being stored in the cache
Proper fix for notification progress not updating
Fixed an issue where bluetooth metadata didn't update correctly
Fixed issue where cached images weren't displayed when offline
Various other minor crash fixes
Various optimisations & attempts to reduce ANRs
improvements: Send 'audio effect' intents to allow 3rd party DSP effects
Removed the debug drawer (debug logging still available in settings)

fixes: Fixed an issue preventing scanner from finding files
Possible fix for bluetooth metadata not updating
Fixed an issue where notification was shown without placeholder art
Fixed ~6 unique crashes and potentially resolved a couple of ANRs (application not responding)
Fixed an issue causing slow loading of app when there are lots of tracks in the queue
Possible (unlikely?) fix for assistant not working with S2 - now implements 'MediaSession.onPrepareFromSearch()' API
improvements: Prioritise folder artwork over embedded (tag) artwork
Prevent .m3u files from being imported as music by S2 scanner
Remember last selected library tab
Added option to clear queue
Increased Emby & Jellyfin server read timeout (S2 waits longer for a response when asking for song listing during scan)
Fall back to 'original date' if year is missing, when reading tags

fixes: Fixed an issue preventing Emby scan from completing if item is missing certain required information
Fixed missing artwork placeholder for expandable album image
Fixed a crash when attempting to load artwork with wifi off and 'Wi-Fi only' on
Fixed image scaling issue for widgets
Fixed an issue where the wrong song would play next, after enabling shuffle
Fixed an issue where library tabs would stop responding to click events
Partial fix for issue where user can start scan before all of their media directories have been discovered
Fixed an issue preventing Emby media scan from completing
Fixed a crash when viewing/adding directories to Shuttle scanner
Possible fix for various Application Not Responding (ANR) errors
improvements: S2 now scans folders for artwork, under the name folder/cover/album.jpg/jpeg/png (case insensitive)
Minor UI improvements when selecting directories for Shuttle scanner

fixes: Fixed an issue with Jellyfin track durations
Fixed an issue where Emby tracks were missing year data
improvements: Dependency updates

fixes: Fixed an issue preventing Jellyfin from scanning media
Fixed a crash when attempting to retrieve pictures from tags
improvements: Added support for Emby & Jellyfin genres

fixes: Fixed an issue where notification progress would get out of sync after skipping tracks
Fixed an issue preventing Emby from connection to local IP addresses
Fixed an issue where play count was incremented twice when repeat mode is on (thanks @Crusader)
Fixed an issue where most played play count didn't update in real time
Fixed an issue where nothing happened after pressing play after the last song in the queue has completed
Performance optimisations when lists are updated with a large number of items
improvements: Artwork no longer flickers when toggling shuffle mode
Don't show play count in 'history' playlist
Moved play count badge to sit on top of artwork image

fixes: Fixed another performance issue, possibly causing the app to stop responding
Fixed issue where genre detail screen was blank
Fixed most played & recently played reversed sort order issue
Fixed an issue where incorrect song played after rearranging the queue
Fixed an issue where favourites button didn't work on now playing screen
Fixed an issue where you couldn't navigate from home -> favourites playlist more than once
Fixed a crash when opening Genre detail screen
Fixed an issue where queue item playback state wasn't updated correctly
improvements: Limit MediaSession queue length to 50 items
Prevent long-named song list items from overlapping overflow button

fixes: Fixed a crash when attempting to add directories to S2 scanner
Performance improvements and bug fixes..
This update aims to resolve a bunch of issues resulting in the app locking up and becoming unresponsive
Resolved several memory leaks, reduced overall memory footprint
improvements: Library tabs are now loaded on demand. So you're more likely to see a loading indicator when swiping to, say, the songs list. This reduces the load when the app is starting up, and when returning to the library screen

fixes: Fixed a bug where scanner would get stuck saying 'scan failed'
Various optimisations.. attempting to fix lag introduced in 0.1.0

features: Multi-select artists, albums & songs to add to playlist, queue or edit tags
improvements: Minor improvements
